subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits are dynamic and higher than free tier; message caps can apply during peak hours.
5x more usage than free tier; estimated 100 messages per 8 hours on Sonnet 3.5.
Included in Pro subscription with much higher limits than free tier.
Available within Google One AI Premium plan, includes 1M token/month allowance.
Available within Google One AI Premium plan, included in the 1M token/month allowance.

meta.note: Meta's Llama models are open source. Pricing shown is for a managed service (e.g., AWS Bedrock, GCP Vertex AI) and excludes self-hosting infrastructure costs.

microsoft_copilot.note: Microsoft Copilot is primarily sold via subscription. Copilot Pro is $20/month. Microsoft 365 Copilot is $30/month. Pricing is not token-based for individual consumers.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Estimated 30-40% for consumer-facing products (ChatGPT Plus, Claude Pro), with majority of revenue still from enterprise API contracts.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression and efficiency gains, particularly at the mid-to-low tier. Competition is shifting from solely top-tier performance to a balance of performance, cost, and specialization, with new models from Asia (DeepSeek, Qwen) setting new lows for cost-per-token.
